title: The Spiritualist 1948 (Film-Noir, Thriller) Directed by Bernard Vorhaus

sources.title: The Spiritualist 1948 (Film-Noir, Thriller) Directed by Bernard Vorhaus
sources.description:
A grieving widow named Christine Faber encounters a mysterious mystic named Alexis, who claims he can help her communicate with her deceased husband. But the handsome crook seems to have other plans in mind...

Original title: The Amazing Mr. X (1948) AKA: The Spiritualist
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/Z8YAnVsH-jc


Director: Bernard Vorhaus
Writers: Crane Wilbur, Muriel Roy Bolton 
Stars: Turhan Bey, Lynn Bari, Cathy O'Donnell, Richard Carlson
Genre: Colorized, Cult Film, Film-Noir, Horror, Thriller


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:40 A mysterious encounter leads to discussions about past love and a potential proposal, set against a backdrop of ocean and romance.
20:47 A woman experiences strange occurrences related to her deceased fiancé, causing distress and confusion.
27:33 A spiritualist is suspected of being an impostor as a detective is hired to investigate him, causing tension and skepticism.
33:48 Insight into a complex relationship and mysterious character interactions.
44:49 A séance with a skeptical audience member turns eerie as a medium claims to communicate with the dead.
55:34 A mysterious plot involving manipulation, deception, and a haunting presence unfolds in a vintage film.
1:07:49 A mysterious plot unfolds involving a woman named Chris, a cliff incident, and a spiritualist named Paul.


@CultCinemaClassics
